SAINT.Name: Afterfeast of the Exaltation of the Cross
St. Eumenius, Bishop of Gortyna (7th C)
Martyrs Sophia and Irene of Egypt (3rd C)
Greatmartyr Prince Bidzini (Cholokashvili), and the martyred princes Shalva, and Elizbar of Xana, Georgia (+1660)
New Hieromartyr Amphilochiy, Bishop of Krasnoyarsk and those with him (+1937)
